question: how many times have real madrid won the champions league in a row
api_result: Real Madrid has won the UEFA Champions League (formerly known as the European Cup) three times in a row. They achieved this remarkable feat from 2016 to 2018, winning the tournament in the 2015-16, 2016-17, and 2017-18 seasons. This made them the first team to win the Champions League three consecutive times in the competition's modern format.
